system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision menu bar. GTK+ implementation." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2017-03-27 13:31:29 -0700 (Mon, 27 Mar 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100058 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xmlEV_MENU_BAR_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_menu_bar_i.xmlEV_MENU_BAR_I redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_list_imp.xmlEV_MENU_ITEM_LIST_IMP export {../implementation_gtk/ev_window_imp.xmlEV_WINDOW_IMP} ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_list_imp.xml#f_list_widgetlist_widget redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_makemake end
../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xmlEV_ANY_IMP redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
create ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_makemake
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_old_make../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make (an_interface: attached like ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface) -- Create underlying native toolkit objects. -- Every descendant should exactly one a creation procedure ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_makemake. -- Must call base_make. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_assign_interfaceassign_interface (an_interface) end
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_makemake -- Create and initialize Current. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_set_c_objectset_c_object ({../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_menu_bar_newgtk_menu_bar_new) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_widget_showgtk_widget_show (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object) ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_makePrecursor end
feature -- Measurement
f_x_position../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_x_positionx_position: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Horizontal offset relative to parent ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_x_positionx_position in pixels. do end
f_y_position../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_y_positiony_position: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Vertical offset relative to parent ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_y_positiony_position in pixels. do end
f_screen_x../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_screen_xscreen_x: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Horizontal offset relative to screen. do end
f_screen_y../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_screen_yscreen_y: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Vertical offset relative to screen. do end
f_width../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_widthwidth: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Horizontal size in pixels. do end
f_height../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_heightheight: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Vertical size in pixels. do end
f_minimum_width../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_minimum_widthminimum_width: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Minimum horizontal size in pixels. do end
f_minimum_height../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_minimum_heightminimum_height: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Minimum vertical size in pixels. do end
feature {../implementation_gtk/ev_window_imp.xmlEV_WINDOW_IMP} -- Implementation
f_set_parent_window_imp../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_set_parent_window_impset_parent_window_imp (a_wind: ../implementation_gtk/ev_window_imp.xmlEV_WINDOW_IMP) -- Set parent_window to a_wind. require a_wind_not_void: a_wind /= Void do ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_parent_impparent_imp := a_wind end
f_parent../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_parentparent: detachable ../interface/ev_window.xmlEV_WINDOW -- Parent window of Current. do if attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_parent_impparent_imp as l_parent_imp then Result := l_parent_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_window_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end end
f_remove_parent_window../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_remove_parent_windowremove_parent_window -- Set parent_window to Void. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_parent_impparent_imp := Void end
f_parent_imp../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_parent_impparent_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_window_imp.xmlEV_WINDOW_IMP
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_menu_bar.xmlEV_MENU_BAR note option: stable attribute end
note copyright: "Copyright (c) 1984-2017, Eiffel Software and others" license: "Eiffel Forum License v2 (see http://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txthttp://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txt)" source: "[ Eiffel Software 5949 Hollister Ave., Goleta, CA 93117 USA Telephone 805-685-1006, Fax 805-685-6869 Website http://www.eiffel.comhttp://www.eiffel.com Customer support http://support.eiffel.comhttp://support.eiffel.com ]"
end -- class ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_bar_imp.xmlEV_MENU_BAR_IMP
